name: Cube_Destroyer
description:
Warning: Multiplayer modes are not functional in this version.

I started the development as a project for Android devices and to be played in portrait mode and with multiplayer as the main feature in mind. As you can see, this is a conversion for PC and to be used with a mouse instead of a touchscreen, and at the moment, multiplayer features completely broken.

The thing is, that I was able to have a working multiplayer back then when I was working on the Android version. I was even in the phase of improving multiplayer and core game elements when the framework I used for the multiplayer aspect got an update  that made  the game unable to make proper connections between players anymore.  And recovering the old version didn't help, I had a services problem. Anyway, the beta is still out there if you are interested... 

Well!, given the situation I was in, I decided to put the development on hold until a new multiplayer framework update came in. But alas, a few months later, GooglePlayServices anounced that the services I was using for the game were going to be discontinued and that I 'should' move to Firebase.

There are even more misfortunes I could talk about related to the state of the project on GooglePlay, but I got tired of them so I decided to try to make a quick conversion of the game so you can enjoy it here, although partially.

I considered implementing a classic LAN multiplayer feature for the game while working on the conversion and improve the game mechanics, but because I'm in the middle of a more atractive project at the moment, I prefer to see if players may be interested in improving this game first. A little bit of healthy curiosity.

I hope you can enjoy it!

Cheers!
